---

Rather than a normal bowstring, this _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [thundering](/Equipment.aspx?ID=306) [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75)_ has a string made of animal gut, much like a musical instrument's. When you shoot the bow, it releases a soft musical note—sonorous if your aim is true and discordant if your shot goes off-target.
